item.description:
April Bernard will read both some of her poetry and from her novel about Margaret Fuller, Miss Fuller.

The library is a modern-looking brick building on the corner ofTremont and West Newton Streets.

(Free wine and cheese, books for sale, good questions asked, a nicecommunity spirit, metered parking on Tremont Street.)

Later in February, on the 26th, Andre Dubus III will read. Â DouglasBauer reads in April, and Alice Hoffman is coming in May.
item.name: Feb. 5: Bernard at BPL's South End branch
